issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
While storm-autocreds module excludes some critical (easy to make version conflict) dependencies but still contains jersey 1.9 which makes conflict against jersey 2.x.

We should exclude jersey and additional unneeded libraries if any.
fields.summary: storm-autocreds adds jersey 1.x to worker classpath

You can merge this pull request into a Git repository by running:

    $ git pull https://github.com/HeartSaVioR/storm STORM-2536-1.x

Alternatively you can review and apply these changes as the patch at:

    https://github.com/apache/storm/pull/2144.patch

To close this pull request, make a commit to your master/trunk branch
with (at least) the following in the commit message:

    This closes #2144
    
----
commit e0a3bea51e334614cdcc1dab1b8ac327ebaa8bd3
Author: Jungtaek Lim <kabhwan@gmail.com>
Date:   2017-05-29T13:34:11Z

    STORM-2536 excludes jersey 1.x from storm-autocreds

----
